# isMiniaturizable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the window displays a minimize button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isMiniaturizable: Bool { get set }
```

## Specifying window behaviors

- **isClosable**: A Boolean value that determines whether the window displays a close button.
